# Request for Proposal: Mid-Term Evaluation of the AI4D Africa Program

## Overview

The International Development Research Centre (IDRC) invites proposals from a team of experts to conduct a mid-term evaluation of the Education and Science team's Artificial Intelligence for Development (AI4D) Africa Program.

## Background

The AI4D Africa Program aims to promote the adoption of artificial intelligence to address development challenges in Africa. As the program reaches its mid-point, IDRC seeks to assess its progress, identify areas for improvement, and inform decision-making for the remaining program duration.

## Request for Proposal

IDRC requests proposals for a team to provide the following services:

* Conduct a mid-term evaluation of the AI4D Africa Program
* Assess the program's progress and achievements
* Identify areas for improvement and recommend strategies for enhancement
* Develop a comprehensive report detailing the evaluation findings and recommendations

## Key Dates

* Tender closing date: 17 February 2023, at 13:00 EST
* Expected contract start date: None
* Expected contract end date: None

## Evaluation Criteria

Proposals will be evaluated based on the following criteria:

* Expertise and qualifications of the evaluation team
* Understanding of the AI4D Africa Program and its objectives
* Methodology and approach for conducting the evaluation
* Quality of the proposed report and recommendations

## Trade Agreements

This procurement is covered under the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).

## Contact Information

For further information and to submit a proposal, please contact Lindsay Empey at lempey@idrc.ca.
